body.name: Dr. Bronner's - Organic Lotion (Orange Lavender, 8 Ounce) - Body Lotion & Moisturizer, Certified Organic, Soothing for Hands, Face and Body, Highly Emollient, Nourishes and Hydrates, Vegan, Non-GMO
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 40 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Fair for Life certifies for fair trade and more socially and environmentally responsible supply chains. MADE WITH FAIR TRADE INGREDIENTS Natrue certified cosmetics are made from naturally sourced ingredients. ORGANIC COSMETICS USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: USDA ORGANIC & FAIR TRADE INGREDIENTS: Dr. Bronner's Organic Lotions are formulated with organic jojoba oil to heal & soothe, organic coconut oil to moisturize, organic hemp & avocado oils to keep skin smooth & supple. OK!

ONLY THE PUREST, ORGANIC ESSENTIAL OILS & INGREDIENTS: Dr. Bronner’s is committed to providing the purest ingredients for our customers. That’s why only the finest organic essential oils are used for fragrance—breathe deeply!

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR MOST SKIN TYPES: Great for sensitive, dry, rough, or combination skin! Our Organic Lotions can be used on hands, face, body & everywhere! Give your skin a treat with this rich, nourishing lotion—massage deeply!

OUR ORGANIC LOTIONS ARE HIGHLY EMOLLIENT: Start with a small amount! Keep a bottle by your sink & apply a pea-sized amount after hand-washing. Put it on right out of the shower—a few squirts will cover the whole body. It absorbs quickly!

CERTIFIED UNDER THE NATIONAL ORGANIC PROGRAM: Our products are certified under the same program that certifies all organically-produced agriculture & food in the United States. This is important because what you put on your body goes into your body.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Purest Organic Ingredients No synthetic preservatives, no detergents and no foaming agents—we use only the purest organic ingredients, most of them are also fair trade ingredients! We work with fair trade suppliers to implement regenerative organic farming practices that enrich soil, increase biodiversity and help combat climate change. Farm to shelf to shower, Dr. Bronner's is building trust, health, community, wealth! Fair prices-wages-conditions for farmers, suppliers—healthy ingredients and sustainable ingredients for you! Our Certifications Truth in Labeling! No greenwashing hype! Our products are verified to the strictest industry standards— most are certified to same organic standards as food! USDA Certified Organic to ensure no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers; Fair For Life fair trade certification to verify ethical working conditions & fair prices along our entire supply chain; most products Certified Vegan; Certified Leaping Bunny to verify that none of our ingredients or products are tested on animals; B Corp Certified to measure our social and environmental performance according to an independent third-party standard. Look for the logos! Give & give! We see our company as an engine to create positive change in the world, funding & fighting for the causes we believe in: regenerative agriculture, fair trade, wage equality, animal welfare—peace on Spaceship Earth! Dr. Bronner’s caps executive salaries at 5x that of our lowest-paid full-time employees, allowing us to share profits, share talent, share muscle, share voice—give & give, fund & fight for what’s right! Sustainability at Dr. Bronner's Our guiding principles: make humble and mindful use of the Earth’s gifts—what comes from the Earth must go back! Healthy soils, healthy farms and green factories make great soap! Dr. Bronner’s works with farmers to implement regenerative organic practices. Our coconut, palm and mint oil farms in Sri Lanka, Ghana and India sequestered ~16,000 MT of CO2 —removing greenhouse gases from the environment to help mitigate climate change. Our factory is powered by renewable energy and the soap we make is completely non-toxic, preservative free, detergent free and foaming agent free! All our cylinder soap bottles are made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic. Let’s regenerate and heal earth! All-One!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love the smell. It feels very nice and it has no perfumes, or harmful additives. One of the only lotions I can use for my eczema. It's so hard to find lotions or soaps without any perfumes or harmful additives. It feels very nice on the skin (I can even use it on my face) and hydrates well, leaving skin feeling soft. Note, it does use essential oils

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, clean ingredients & smells great!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We Trust doctor Bronner's at our house to have faith and clean ingredients and high quality products that smell good. This lotion has really helped our dry skin since we moved to the desert and we are thankful. We ordered more in other scents as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not what I remember
reviews.reviewText: Smells great but very runny. Not very moisturizing either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing scent, and texture. Non greasy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thinish lotion, masculine scent
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like this patchouli lime lotion, it sounded great. But it didn’t smell great and also smelled like tobacco or some other manly thing going on. The lotion also is not particularly moisturizing. I gave the bottle to a guy friend, and left it on his porch so that he could not reject the “gift.”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Insanely Good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell!
reviews.reviewText: Great non toxic lotion. Love the smell and it’s super moisturizing!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but effective
reviews.reviewText: I love how this lotion goes on my skin, it’s very lightweight, not greasy and really soaks into your skin. My only complaint is that the lavender is very overpowering. If you like lavender, you’ll love this product, but the smells is too strong for me. I hope they come out with a lotion without lavender or peppermint, I love it otherwise
Has a really good peppermint, smell strong

Arrived on time in excellent condition.This product has a very strong patchouli scent that actually lingers for over 48 hours even after two showers! Even just using it as a hand lotion, the scent will linger all day.
I buy this product and the range Dr Bronner produces on a regular basis. Moisturizer is not sticky or uncomfortable in hot weather. Gets readily absorbed into the skin!

reviews.reviewTitle: lait de corps conforme à mes attentes
reviews.reviewText: Adepte des laits de corps du Dr Bronner's depuis des années, j'ai commandé ce lait de corps limette-patchouli et j'ai bien retrouvé la texture et l'odeur et la qualité des produits de cette marque, qui malheureusement arrête cette gamme. Lait corporel non gras et hydratant avec un léger parfum agréable qui ne masque pas votre parfum habituel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works how it should and smells great.
